rows.label: qst700605_msg0001
rows.name: Ah, brothers!? How was it?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0002
rows.name: ...and that's what happened.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0003
rows.name: Sorry, we couldn't be of help...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0004
rows.name: No, it's not your fault, brothers.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0005
rows.name:
It just means my invention
wasn't complete yet.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0006
rows.name:
But, I see... I was so close to making
the medicine to give to her...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0007
rows.name: Her? Is that...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0008
rows.name: HEEEEEY!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0009
rows.name: Excuse me, all of you!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0010
rows.name: Y-Yes?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0011
rows.name:
I heard the word "invention"
and came flying over!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0012
rows.name:
Is that machine something
you built, brother?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0013
rows.name: Oh, no, it was this boy...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0014
rows.name: What!? A child like this!?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0015
rows.name: ...Who is this old man?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0016
rows.name: Glad you asked!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0017
rows.name:
I am the number one genius inventor
in Iira! My name is Gennai!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0018
rows.name: I heard from my brother...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0019
rows.name:
Still, you've got quite the
potential for someone so young!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0020
rows.name: He's not listening at all...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0021
rows.name: Boy, what is your name!?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0022
rows.name: M-Marco... but.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0023
rows.name:
All right! Young Marco! From
today, you are my apprentice!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0024
rows.name:
Ehh? I'm fine, I don't want
to be an apprentice...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0025
rows.name:
What are you saying! What's
a fine young man like you
being so modest for!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0026
rows.name: N-No, I'm really fine...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0027
rows.name: Now, now, please leave this to me.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0029
rows.name:
Marco-kun, why don't you
think of it this way?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0030
rows.name:
Your ultimate goal isn't the
completion of this machine, is it?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0031
rows.name:
If that's the case, then no
matter what the process is, it
shouldn't be a big problem.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0032
rows.name: Ah...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0033
rows.name:
You should absorb the skills and knowledge
from this old man for your own sake, and
use it as fuel to achieve your goal.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0034
rows.name:
Well, the price for that is being the
apprentice and assistant to this
self-proclaimed genius inventor, I suppose?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0035
rows.name: But it's okay, you can...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0036
rows.name: You can do it! Right? Hehe.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0038
rows.name: Brother... I'll do my best!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0039
rows.name:
If it's come to this, I'm going
to learn everything I can about
machines from this old man!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0040
rows.name:
Just because I failed once, moping
around doesn't get me anywhere!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0041
rows.name: Yes, that's right... Really...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0042
rows.name:
Hey, is that okay? Saying
something so irresponsible.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0043
rows.name: It's fine...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0044
rows.name:
He's gained a great asset from
this experience: failure.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0045
rows.name:
Those who have known failure once
can grow in any environment.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0046
rows.name: And besides...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0047
rows.name: Besides?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0048
rows.name: He taught me something again.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0049
rows.name:
That anyone, if their feelings are
strong enough, can stand up to any
hardship, no matter how many times...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0050
rows.name:
...Something so obvious that
we tend to forget as adults.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0051
rows.name: ...Did you have a time like that?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0052
rows.name: Who knows?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0053
rows.name: That's not fair.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0054
rows.name: Anyway, our job here is done...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0055
rows.name:
Well, we should get going. We'll
see you again, Marco-kun!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0056
rows.name: Yeah! Thank you so much! Brothers!
